channel.title: Little question About Quests ( SEVER EDITING )
channel.description:
Dear Moparscape community, Hi guys i just started today with a Clean sourche and i started with coding abit, now i found a problem witch is easy to solve for you guys =) ok my question is. [b][u] How can i Start With All Quests Done? How can i Delete all quest so thare are no Requirments for items like D long / D dagger or Lunar Accients Magic?[/u][/b]
Regardings , exhounter

item.title: Little question About Quests ( SEVER EDITING )
item.dc:creator: @alancarr123 alancarr123
item.description:
@alancarr123 wrote:

How can i Start With All Quests Done? Player.java change the q1, q2, q3 etc to 15.
How can i Delete all quest so thare are no Requirments for items like D long / D dagger or Lunar Accients Magic? i’ll let you work out this yourself but here’s some help in Client.java
if(wearID == 13664 && q1 == 0){
sM(“You must have defeated TzTok-Jad to wield dragon claws.”);
return false;
}
Hehe not really sure about 2nd question but pretty sure its related to that.

Read full topic
item.source: Little question About Quests ( SEVER EDITING )
